00132 typedef struct {
00133         char * ascii;                   
00134         enum opdis_op_cat_t category;   
00135         enum opdis_op_flag_t flags;     
00136         union {
00137                 opdis_reg_t reg;        
00138                 opdis_addr_expr_t expr; 
00139                 opdis_abs_addr_t abs;   
00140                 union {
00141                         opdis_vma_t vma;
00142                         uint64_t u;     
00143                         int64_t s;      
00144                 } immediate;            
00145         } value;                        
00146         unsigned char data_size;        
00148         /* fixed-size operand fields */
00149         unsigned char fixed_size;       
00150         unsigned char ascii_sz;         
00151 } opdis_op_t;

00175 typedef struct {
00176         enum opdis_insn_decode_t status;
00177         char * ascii;                   
00179         opdis_off_t offset;             
00180         opdis_vma_t vma;

00193                 enum opdis_cflow_flag_t cflow;  
00194                 enum opdis_stack_flag_t stack;  
00195                 enum opdis_io_flag_t io;        
00196                 enum opdis_bit_flag_t bit;      
00197         } flags;                        
00198         char * comment;                 
00201         /* operands */
00202         opdis_off_t num_operands;       
00203         opdis_off_t alloc_operands;     
00204         opdis_op_t ** operands;         
00206         /* accessors for special operands */

00211         /* fixed-size instruction fields */

00216 } opdis_insn_t;
